Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Sele kusondele kubantu ukuba baphendule (ngezenzo zabo), lo gama bona betshikila bengakhathali
Akukho nkumbuzo intsha (isiTyhilelo) efikayo kubo esuka eNkosini yabo koko bona bayiphulaphula ngendlalo

Ngeentliziyo zabo eziphambukileyo. Abo benza ububi bayazifihla iintetho zabo zasekhusini, (besithi): “Ingaba (lo Mprofeti) uyenye into engaphezulu kunokuba ngumntu njengani? Niza kuzinikela emilingweni nijongile na?”
Yena (uMuhammad) wathi: “INkosi yam Iyakwazi okuthethwa ngamazulu nomhlaba, yaye Yona nguSokuva uSokubona.”
Kodwa bathi: “(isiTyhilelo se’Kur’ân) yingxubevange yamaphupha obuxoki. Unotshe, uyiqambile! Nakanye yimbongi! Makeze nomqondiso njengabamandulo kaloku ababethunyiwe (benemiqondiso).”
Akukho nasinye isixeko kwezo Sazitshabalalisayo, esakholwayo ngaphambili kunabo, Ngoku ke baza kukholwa bona
ASizanga ngaphambili kunawe Sithumele (nto yimbi) koko yayingamadoda eSawatyhilelayo. Ngoko ke buza abantu benkumbuzo (isiBhalo iTorah, iVangeli) ukuba akwazi
Kananjalo aSizanga Sibadale (abaProfeti) ngemizimba engadli kudla bengazanga babe ngabantu abangafiyo
Ukanti Sasizalisekisa kubo isithembiso. Sabasindisa bona ndawonye nabo Sathandayo (ukubasindisa), kodwa Sabatshabalalisa abenzi bobubi
